alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northern Park; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 1:29PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow and occasional blowing snow will continue through late tonight. Continue to use extra caution while driving through tonight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible. Make frequent checks on older family, friends, and neighbors. Ensure portable heaters are used correctly. Do not use generators or grills inside.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northern Park; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland
